Ad-VISOR (Advanced VIsual Scattering Toolkit for Reciprocal-space)ÔÉÅ

Documentation for Ad-VISOR, a PyQt5-based desktop app to explore scattering geometry, convert scattering angles to momentum transfer in reciprocal space and vice versa, and visualize structure factors.
